title: Blurite ore

It can be mined by a player with level 10 Mining, and grants 17.5 Mining experience when mined. After being mined, a blurite ore rock takes approximately 25 seconds to respawn.

Blurite ore is an ore used in the hilt of the blurite sword in The Knight's Sword quest and in blurite crossbows and bolts. It can be mined by a player with level 10 Mining, and grants 17.5 Mining experience when mined. After being mined, a blurite ore rock takes approximately 25 seconds to respawn.

Rocks containing blurite are found only in the mine in the Asgarnian Ice Dungeon, located south of Port Sarim on the tip of the Asgarnian Peninsula and north of Mudskipper Point (Fairy ring AIQ). The Ice Caves are the guarded by Ice warriors and Ice giants, both of which can hit up to 7. Although blurite is mineable by non-members, you need to be a member to smith it. Thus, it is worthless to non-members except for doing The Knight's Sword. The Wise Old Man will offer to buy this ore for 4 coins each after completion of The Knight's Sword.

At level 13 Smithing, blurite ore can be smelted into a blurite bar for smithing into blurite bolts or blurite crossbow limbs for use in a blurite crossbow. You must be a member to do this.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This ore may be a play on words on "blue, right?", which is backed up by its examine text.

[[File:Blurite ore detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Blurite ore''' is an [[ore]] used in the hilt of the [[blurite sword]] in [[The Knight's Sword]] quest and in [[blurite crossbow]]s and [[blurite bolts|bolts]]. It can be mined by a player with level 10 [[Mining]], and grants 17.5 Mining experience when mined. After being mined, a blurite ore rock takes approximately 25 seconds to respawn.

[[Blurite rock|Rocks]] containing blurite are found only in the mine in the [[Asgarnian Ice Dungeon]], located south of [[Port Sarim]] on the tip of the [[Asgarnia]]n Peninsula and north of [[Mudskipper Point]] ([[Fairy ring]] {{Fairycode|AIQ}}). The Ice Caves are the guarded by [[Ice warrior]]s and [[Ice giant]]s, both of which can hit up to 7. Although blurite is mineable by non-members, you need to be a member to smith it. Thus, it is worthless to non-members except for doing The Knight's Sword. The [[Wise Old Man]] will offer to buy this ore for 4 coins each after completion of The Knight's Sword.

At level 13 [[Smithing]], blurite ore can be smelted into a [[blurite bar]] for smithing into [[blurite bolts]] or [[blurite crossbow limbs]] for use in a [[blurite crossbow]]. You '''must''' be a [[member]] to do this.
